channel.title: Perceptron on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Perceptron on My blog

item.title: Training a Perceptron on Logical Operators
item.description: One of the fundamental concepts in machine learning domain is the perceptron, an algorithm inspired by the functioning of a neuron. In this blog post, we will explore the intricacies of perceptron, understand how they learn, and delve into the practical aspect of training a perceptron on logical operators.
